#include<stdio.h>
int main(){
long long input;
long long cases,j,osc=1,t,tsum,output=0;
scanf("%lld",&input);	
	while	(input>0){
		scanf("%lld",&cases);
		output=0;
		osc=1;
		for(t=2;t<=cases;t++){
			j=cases;
			tsum=1;
			for(;j>t;j--){
				tsum = tsum * j;
				}
			output+=osc*tsum;
			if(osc ==1)osc=-1;
			else osc =1;
			}
		printf("%lld\n",output);
		input--;
		}
	return 0;
	}
